briefdescription.para: Called when playback stops (end of file).
Called when playback finishes (reached end of audio).

parameterdescription.para: The audio buffer to play (copied internally)
The sample rate of the buffer

briefdescription.para: Seek to a normalized position (0.0 to 1.0).
Get current playback position in seconds.
Process and mix playback audio into the output buffer Should be called from the audio thread only.

parameterdescription.para: The audio buffer to mix into

briefdescription.para: Prepare for playback Should be called from PluginProcessor::prepareToPlay.
Release resources Should be called from PluginProcessor::releaseResources.
BufferAudioPlayer - Handles audio playback from in-memory AudioBuffer.

detaileddescription.para: This class is designed for playing audio directly from juce::AudioBuffer<float> without needing to encode/decode or save to files. Perfect for previewing recorded audio before upload.

Key features:
Direct buffer-based playback (no file I/O)
Transport controls (play, pause, seek)
Playback progress tracking
Volume control
Automatic resampling to match DAW sample rate
